import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import './Weather.css' import search_icon from '../assets/search.png' import clear_icon from '../assets/clear.png' import cloud_icon from '../assets/cloud.png' import drizzle_icon from '../assets/drizzle.png' import humidity_icon from '../assets/humidity.png' import snow_icon from '../assets/snow.png' import wind_icon from '../assets/wind.png' const Weather = () => { const search = async (city) => { try { const url = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${city}&appid=${import.meta.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY}`; const response = await fetch(url); const data = await response.json(); } catch(error) { } } useEffect(()=>{ search(city) },[]) return (
